Title: Derechin
Description:
Panorama of the harvested field near Derechin (Dziarečyn) town, Grodno Region, Belarus.
A peak of Catholic Church of the Assumption of the Virgin Mary (1913) can be seen at the horizon line, as well as domes of Orthodox Transfiguration Church (1866).
Approximate coordinates are 53°15'28.4''N 24°53'43.7''E
Author: Ivan Tsyrkunovish
